David Walluck is the author of [http://daim.dev.java.net/ daim], the [http://www.fsf.org/copyleft/library.html GPL]'ed [http://java.sun.com/ Java] OSCAR library. He has been working with OSCAR since December 2002, and has worked with various IM protocols professionally for a while before that. David is a student at the [http://www.uconn.edu/ University of Connecticut] studying [http://www.cse.uconn.edu/ Computer Science and Engineering] and has already completed minors in [http://www.math.uconn.edu/index.php?content=Undergraduate/mathminor&sidestrip=&title=Mathematics%20Minor Math] and [http://vm.uconn.edu/~wwwphil/majmin.html Philosophy].
